name: Forky Scavenger Hunt
description:
From June 18th to 28th go on a funtastic scavenger hunt at Walt Disney Studios Park to find Forky and bring him to life! You could even win one of 40 Forky prizes! Only at Disneyland Paris.

https://privacy.thewaltdisneycompany.com/en/current-privacy-policy/
